item.description:
We did a joint picnic with VegOut last year and it was a very nice day so we decided to do it again this year. It will be held in Goddard Park, sites 64 & 65

The picnic will start at 1:00 - I hope you can join us! Please make your dishes Vegan so everyone can enjoy. You can make something ahead of time and/or grill at the park.

Some Information on the Park: Goddard Park attracts thousands of visitors each year as Rhode Island's most popular Metropolitan Park. The park offers a beautiful natural environment with spacious lawns, fields, and forested areas with a variety of trees from all over the world, including 62 deciduous and 19 evergreen species.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Joint Picnic with VegOut
